DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Efficacy TGR 1202 Patients With Relapsed Refractory Hematologic Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Refractory relapse least 1 prior treatment regimen ; Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) score 0 2 ; At least 18 year age .
